Package cxro.common.io.modbus

Provides an object oriented Modbus/TCP implementation in Java.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Modbus
    Interface defining all constants related to the Modbus protocol.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitVector
    Class that implements a collection for bits, storing them packed into bytes.
    ModbusUtil
    Helper class that provides utility methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ModbusException
    Superclass of all specialised exceptions in this package.
    ModbusInterruptedException
    Class that implements a ModbusInterruptedException.
    ModbusIOException
    Class that implements a ModbusIOException.
    ModbusServerException
    Class that implements a ModbusServerException.

Package cxro.common.io.modbus Description

Provides an object oriented Modbus/TCP implementation in Java.
See related documentation for more information.

Package Specification

Related Documentation
